text: “Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Ekiam, kɨ Tairɨn nguibar ekiamɨn gumazamiziba kamaghɨn me mɨgei: Ian nguibar ekiam akarɨghiregh irɨghtɨ, gumazamizir ongarir mɨriamɨn itiba, me nguibam akaraghirezir nɨgɨnim baragh, egh gumazamiziba mɨzazir ekiam isir nɨgɨnim baragh, uarir tongɨn gumazamizibav sozi me ariaghirir nɨgɨnim baragh, dɨgavir kuram damigh akongam.
